itemDescription: Bayliss, Sir Richard Ian Samuel [Dick] (1917–2006), physician

wikipedia_page.main: Sir Richard Ian Samuel Bayliss  (2 January 1917 – 21 April 2006) was an English physician specialising in endocrinology.  He became Physician to the Queen and head of the Medical Household.

response: * 1973–1981: Sir Richard Bayliss, KCVO MD FRCP MRCS
*Sir Richard Bayliss, 89, British physician, Physician to the Queen (1973-1981).
* Richard Bayliss (1917 - 2006) - Physician to the Queen and head of the Medical Household
* Richard Bayliss, English medical doctor and Physician to the Queen
*1983 Richard Bayliss, Thyroid Disease as the Expression of Autoimmune Disorder
